page.title: List of Grand Theft Auto Advance characters

rev.comment: This use is not permitted. See talk page of article mentioned by you.
rev.diff:
Line 4: Line 4:
==Major characters==
==Major characters==
===Mike===
===Mike===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Mike.jpg|thumb|120px|Mike.]]
 
Mike is ''Grand Theft Auto Advance'''s [[protagonist]] and [[player character]]. He and partner [[#Vinnie|Vinnie]] had earned enough money to leave [[Liberty City (Grand Theft Auto)|Liberty City]] for good, but Mike was coaxed by Vinnie to take a few more jobs from the Mafia before leaving. After Vinnie was thought to be killed by a car bomb, Mike attempted to trace the killer, while attracting negative attention from all gangs in the city. Learning that Vinnie was still alive, was responsible for killing several of his bosses, and was intending to leave with Mike's share of the earned money, he killed Vinnie. Mike eventually escapes the city with a private aircraft owned by [[#Cisco|Cisco]], Mike's deceased ally and leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Colombian Cartel|Colombian Cartel]].
Mike is ''Grand Theft Auto Advance'''s [[protagonist]] and [[player character]]. He and partner [[#Vinnie|Vinnie]] had earned enough money to leave [[Liberty City (Grand Theft Auto)|Liberty City]] for good, but Mike was coaxed by Vinnie to take a few more jobs from the Mafia before leaving. After Vinnie was thought to be killed by a car bomb, Mike attempted to trace the killer, while attracting negative attention from all gangs in the city. Learning that Vinnie was still alive, was responsible for killing several of his bosses, and was intending to leave with Mike's share of the earned money, he killed Vinnie. Mike eventually escapes the city with a private aircraft owned by [[#Cisco|Cisco]], Mike's deceased ally and leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Colombian Cartel|Colombian Cartel]].
===Vinnie===
===Vinnie===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Vinnie.jpg|thumb|left|120px|Vinnie.]]
 
Vinnie is the partner and boss of Mike, who insisted Mike in doing a few more jobs before leaving the city. He was allegedly killed by a car bomb, with "his" remains found in the car. He would be killed by Mike, as he reveals his true nature and motive.
Vinnie is the partner and boss of Mike, who insisted Mike in doing a few more jobs before leaving the city. He was allegedly killed by a car bomb, with "his" remains found in the car. He would be killed by Mike, as he reveals his true nature and motive.
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
===8-Ball===
===8-Ball===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters 8-Ball.jpg|thumb|120px|8-Ball.]]
  â  
8-Ball is Mike's second boss after Vinnie was thought to be killed. Initially supplying Mike with several missions while aiding him in tracking Vinnie's murderer, 8-Ball would be on the run as he was chased by Vinnie's assassins.
8-Ball is Mike's second boss after Vinnie was thought to be killed. Initially supplying Mike with several missions while aiding him in tracking Vinnie's murderer, 8-Ball would be on the run as he was chased by Vinnie's assassins.
Line 22: Line 18:
===Jonnie===
===Jonnie===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Jonnie.jpg|thumb|left|120px|Jonnie.]]
  â  
Jonnie is a bartender in the Red Light District, Portland Island. He served as Mike's third boss, before he was assassinated. Mike's discovery of Jonnie's death was followed by a pursuit of Yardies members that led to [[#King Courtney|King Courtney]], the head of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Uptown Yardies|Yardies]].
Jonnie is a bartender in the Red Light District, Portland Island. He served as Mike's third boss, before he was assassinated. Mike's discovery of Jonnie's death was followed by a pursuit of Yardies members that led to [[#King Courtney|King Courtney]], the head of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Uptown Yardies|Yardies]].
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
===King Courtney===
===King Courtney===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters King Courtney.jpg|thumb|120px|King Courtney.]]
  â  
King Courtney is the leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Uptown Yardies|Uptown Yardies]] and Mike's fourth boss. Involved in a turf war with the Colombian Cartel, Courtney is also involved in illegal racing around Staunton Island. He and his gang would serve as another primary antagonist alongside Vinnie near the end of the storyline.
King Courtney is the leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Uptown Yardies|Uptown Yardies]] and Mike's fourth boss. Involved in a turf war with the Colombian Cartel, Courtney is also involved in illegal racing around Staunton Island. He and his gang would serve as another primary antagonist alongside Vinnie near the end of the storyline.
Line 35: Line 27:
===Cisco===
===Cisco===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Cisco.jpg|thumb|left|120px|Cisco.]]
  â  
Cisco is the leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Colombian Cartel|Colombian Cartel]] and Mike's fifth boss. He was killed by Vinnie and was succeeded by an unnamed lieutenant (it remains to be seen if the successor is [[List of characters in Grand Theft Auto III#Miguel|Miguel]], a key member of the Cartel in ''[[Grand Theft Auto III]]'' and ''[[Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories|Liberty City Stories]]'').
Cisco is the leader of the [[List of gangs in Grand Theft Auto series#Colombian Cartel|Colombian Cartel]] and Mike's fifth boss. He was killed by Vinnie and was succeeded by an unnamed lieutenant (it remains to be seen if the successor is [[List of characters in Grand Theft Auto III#Miguel|Miguel]], a key member of the Cartel in ''[[Grand Theft Auto III]]'' and ''[[Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories|Liberty City Stories]]'').
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
<div style="clear:both;"></div>
===Asuka Kasen===
===Asuka Kasen===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Asuka.jpg|thumb|120px|Asuka Kasen.]]
  â  
Asuka Kasen is the leader of the Yakuza and is Mike's sixth boss. Asuka is revealed to have bizarre fetishes and sexual preferences ([[BDSM]]).
Asuka Kasen is the leader of the Yakuza and is Mike's sixth boss. Asuka is revealed to have bizarre fetishes and sexual preferences ([[BDSM]]).
Line 48: Line 36:
===Yuka===
===Yuka===
â
[[Image:GTAA characters Yuka.jpg|thumb|left|120px|Yuka.]]
 
Yuka is Asuka Kasen's young niece. Yuka served in only one major plotline, in which Mike was ordered by Cisco to kidnap Yuka as Cartel blackmail to the Yakuza, before she would eventually be rescued by Mike and returned to Asuka.
Yuka is Asuka Kasen's young niece. Yuka served in only one major plotline, in which Mike was ordered by Cisco to kidnap Yuka as Cartel blackmail to the Yakuza, before she would eventually be rescued by Mike and returned to Asuka.
